body: i'm thankful, even though i don't have much time this morning because i have an eye doctor appointment later and so need to get in some work early today, to make a little time for notes. i'm thankful that i have good vision insurance and am going to get new glasses that will hopefully result in me having fewer headaches than i do now, though i know that even if i have unscratched glasses in the correct prescription i still need to be better about looking away from my screen during the day. i'm thankful that i slept really poorly last night i think because i had too many b vitamins which made me jumpy and jittery as fuck. i'm thankful to not take so many b vitamins anymore. i'm thankful that i did not eat too much dried fruit yesterday. i'm thankful for [this neural network that's being trained to write recipes](http://www.metafilter.com/165949/Completely-Meat-Chocolate-Pie). i'm thankful for [this soothing and frankly adorable video](http://www.neatorama.com/neatolicious/2017/03/27/the-long-egg-speriment-how-to-make-a-long-egg-at-home/?utm_campaign=trueAnthem:+Trending+Content&utm_content=58db071404d3012b808fc4de&utm_medium=trueAnthem&utm_source=twitter) in which a man named keef makes a strange extruded egg log for use in a rolled meat pie. i'm thankful for katie notopoulos's [investigative report on rinsing lemons](https://www.buzzfeed.com/katienotopoulos/do-you-rinse-lemons?utm_term=.poOJVyYwR#.dfwYLa4j3). i'm thankful to remember that [we are all butt dust and into dust shall we return](https://twitter.com/jallensparks/status/846500350387535873).
normalized_markdown: i'm thankful, even though i don't have much time this morning because i have an eye doctor appointment later and so need to get in some work early today, to make a little time for notes. i'm thankful that i have good vision insurance and am going to get new glasses that will hopefully result in me having fewer headaches than i do now, though i know that even if i have unscratched glasses in the correct prescription i still need to be better about looking away from my screen during the day. i'm thankful that i slept really poorly last night i think because i had too many b vitamins which made me jumpy and jittery as fuck. i'm thankful to not take so many b vitamins anymore. i'm thankful that i did not eat too much dried fruit yesterday. i'm thankful for [this neural network that's being trained to write recipes](http://www.metafilter.com/165949/Completely-Meat-Chocolate-Pie). i'm thankful for [this soothing and frankly adorable video](http://www.neatorama.com/neatolicious/2017/03/27/the-long-egg-speriment-how-to-make-a-long-egg-at-home/?utm_campaign=trueAnthem:+Trending+Content&utm_content=58db071404d3012b808fc4de&utm_medium=trueAnthem&utm_source=twitter) in which a man named keef makes a strange extruded egg log for use in a rolled meat pie. i'm thankful for katie notopoulos's [investigative report on rinsing lemons](https://www.buzzfeed.com/katienotopoulos/do-you-rinse-lemons?utm_term=.poOJVyYwR#.dfwYLa4j3). i'm thankful to remember that [we are all butt dust and into dust shall we return](https://twitter.com/jallensparks/status/846500350387535873).
